Superchain.definition: A shared sequencing and bridging standard across OP Stack chains.
Superchain.explanation: The Superchain connects multiple chains together using Optimismâ€™s technology, allowing assets and messages to move seamlessly.
examples: 'The Superchain aims to unify Ethereum scaling solutions.'

zk-rollups.definition: A type of Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum.
zk-rollups.explanation: ZK-rollups bundle many transactions into one and post only the proof to Ethereum, reducing gas costs.ZK-rollups bundle many transactions into one and post only the proof to Ethereum, reducing gas costsZK-rollups bundle many transactions into one and post only the proof to Ethereum, reducing gas costs
